417190.name: Astro Lords: Quick Start
417190.description:
Accelerate your development in the game with the new "Quick Start" offer

DLC "Quick Start" includes: [/]
  • Science artifact [/] "Memory module" bronze - science generation + 60% [/]
  • Rune of production [/] "Tiirs" golden - Speed ​​of construction and improvement of buildings on the asteroid + 50% [/]
  • Officer warrior [/] "Alexander Onisimov" 3 ranks - Amount of experience gained for Captains + 20% [/]
  • Auto-equipment [/] premium service for 1 month - Automatic equipment with ammunition [/] [/]

    How to use the DLC: [/]
    • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
    • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, just select it and press the button: Collect the reward [/]
    • Enjoy your DLC! [/]

      Attention, important! [/]
      In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
